name: Trajectile (itch)
description:
Controls:

Space - Activate thrust/burn out

R - Reset Stage

T - Return to Title Screen/Level Select

If the game does not respond at the title screen try re-loading the page.

Clicking on the title screen bugs out the menu.

If the start button is red hitting space should let you select a level.

Your Trajectile is malfunctioning.

Your connection is limited.

Once thrust has been engaged shut down will become difficult.

Any attempts to re-engage or shut down may result in catastrophic failure.

The mission will continue.

Reach the Target.

(late) Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out of Control
